Uniccon Group owns Africa&rsquo;s leading hub for STEM research, training, and solutions (STEMFocus). Research is the bedrock of our innovative services in the marketplace, payment gateway, workflow optimization, financial intel, cybersecurity, cloud infrastructure, and e-learning products. We are futuristic and leading with METAVERSE and NFTs in Africa. The operations extend to Agro-commodities processing and export, fashion brands, and general contracting business. Unicorn Group is a key player in their respective industries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Customer Relationship / Front Desk Officer (NYSC)&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Responsibilities
Front Desk &amp; Administrative Duties:


	Greet and welcome clients, visitors, and partners with warmth and professionalism.
	Maintain the front desk area, ensuring it is clean, organized, and visually appealing.
	Answer, screen, and route incoming calls to the appropriate departments or personnel.
	Manage appointment calendars, schedule client meetings, and assist staff with coordination needs.
	Handle incoming and outgoing correspondence, including mail and packages.
	Assist with documentation, data entry, filing, and other administrative tasks as necessary.
	Maintain accurate visitor logs and ensure adherence to facility access protocols.


Customer Relationship Management:


	Serve as the primary contact for client inquiries, complaints, and service-related questions.
	Build and maintain positive, long-term relationships with clients through consistent, high-quality service.
	Provide detailed information about the company&rsquo;s services, products, policies, and processes.
	Ensure prompt resolution of customer concerns by coordinating with internal teams.
	Follow up with clients to assess satisfaction levels and identify opportunities for service improvement.
	Support client onboarding processes to ensure a seamless customer experience.
	Maintain a customer feedback system and provide periodic reports to management.


Internal Collaboration:


	Work closely with operations, sales, HR, and other departments to ensure smooth daily operations.
	Escalate urgent issues to relevant teams and track them to resolution.
	Contribute to the development of customer service standards and front-desk procedures.


Qualifications


	HND/Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Business Administration, Communications, Customer Service, or a related field
	Proven experience in customer service, customer relationship management, or front desk operations.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and office management tools.
	Strong organizational, multitasking, and problem-solving abilities.
	Professional appearance with a friendly, customer-focused attitude.


Key Skills:


	Strong interpersonal and relationship-building skills.
	Ability to manage multiple tasks while maintaining attention to detail.
	Emotional intelligence and confidence in handling difficult clients.
	Proactive attitude with the ability to work with minimal supervision.
	High level of discretion and professionalism.


Method of Application

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head of Kids Centre

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja FCT
Reports to: CEO

Main Functions


	The Head of Centre is responsible for the overall management and strategic direction of the edu-play centre.
	This includes ensuring the delivery of high-quality programs, maintaining a safe and nurturing environment for children, managing staff, and driving revenue generation through enrolments and partnerships.
	The role requires strong leadership, financial acumen, and a passion for early childhood education.


Role Responsibilities
Centre Management and Operations:


	Oversee the daily operations of the centre, ensuring all programs run smoothly and efficiently.
	Ensure the centre complies with all safety, licensing, and regulatory requirements.
	Manage the centre&rsquo;s resources, including equipment, supplies, and facilities, to maintain a high standard of quality.


Revenue Generation and Financial Management:


	Develop and execute strategies to increase enrolment and maximize occupancy rates.
	Identify new revenue opportunities, including special programs, workshops, and holiday camps.
	Collaborate with the Business Developers to establish and nurture partnerships with schools, community organizations, and other stakeholders.
	Monitor and manage the centre&rsquo;s budget, ensuring profitability and cost efficiency.
	Prepare basic financial reports, track revenue performance, and recommend adjustments to meet financial targets.


Staff Leadership and Development:


	Supervise staff, ensuring they deliver exceptional care and education.
	Conduct regular performance reviews, provide feedback, and address any performance issues.
	Foster a collaborative and inclusive workplace culture that promotes teamwork and innovation.
	Organize regular staff meetings to align on goals, share updates, and address challenges.


Program Development and Quality Assurance:


	Design and implement engaging and age-appropriate educational and recreational programs.
	Evaluate the effectiveness of programs, incorporating feedback from parents and staff.
	Ensure all activities align with the centre&rsquo;s mission and values.


Parent and Community Engagement:


	Build strong relationships with parents, acting as the primary point of contact for inquiries and feedback.
	Organize parent engagement activities, including open houses and workshops.
	Represent the centre at community events to increase visibility and attract new clients.


Marketing and Branding:


	Work with the Content Creator and Social Media Manager to design and execute marketing campaigns
	Ensure consistent branding and messaging across all promotional materials.
	Monitor market trends and competitor activities to inform marketing strategies.


Risk Management and Problem-Solving:


	Identify and mitigate risks to ensure the safety and well-being of children and staff.
	Resolve conflicts and address complaints from parents or staff professionally and effectively.


Direct Reports:


	Caregivers
	Business Developers
	Content Creator and Social Media Manager
	All Administrative Staff.


Qualifications
Education and Certifications:


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Early Childhood Education, Business Administration, or a related field
	A Master&rsquo;s degree is an advantage.


Experience:


	Minimum of 6 years in a leadership role within the education or childcare industry.
	Proven track record in revenue generation, budget management, and team leadership.


Skills
Leadership and Management:


	Strong ability to inspire and lead a diverse team.
	Excellent decision-making and problem-solving skills.


Revenue and Business Acumen:


	Skilled in developing and implementing revenue-generating strategies.
	Strong financial management and budget oversight abilities.


Communication and Interpersonal Skills:


	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Ability to build trust and rapport with parents, staff, and stakeholders.


Operational Expertise:


	Exceptional organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Knowledge of regulatory and licensing requirements for childcare centres.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;recruitment@domeoresources.org&nbsp;using &quot;Head of Kids Centre - Lagos&quot; as the subject of the email.

title: Job Vacancies at DET Consulting Limited
content:
DET Consulting Limited is a Human Resource and Outsourcing solutions firm committed to helping organizations attract top talent, optimize workforce performance, and drive business growth. We specialize in recruitment, staff outsourcing, HR advisory, training, and payroll services, delivering customized solutions that align with organizational goals. Our mission is simple: Empowering people, transforming businesses.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Personal Driver

Job Location: Ebute-Meta, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're looking for an experienced Personal Driver with a valid driver's license to join a workspace in Ebute-Meta, Lagos!


Requirements


	Minimum 2 years or more of driving experience
	Ability to drive a manual transmission
	Valid driver's license
	Knowledge of Lagos roads
	Trustworthy and reliable.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 30th December, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: info.detconsultingltd@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Sales Executive Officer

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a confident, driven, and customer-focused Sales Executive Officer to join our real estate team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying potential clients, driving sales, managing property inquiries, and ensuring excellent customer experience from first contact to closing.
	You must be persuasive, goal-oriented, and passionate about real estate sales.


Key Responsibilities


	Source and identify potential clients interested in real estate products and services.
	Promote and market available properties through various channels.
	Conduct property tours and provide accurate information to prospective clients.
	Handle inquiries, follow up on leads, and maintain strong client relationships.
	Achieve monthly and quarterly sales targets set by management.
	Prepare and present sales proposals, documentation, and contracts.
	Conduct market research to stay informed about pricing, competitors, and industry developments.
	Maintain an updated database of clients, prospects, and property listings.
	Collaborate with the Sales Manager to develop and implement sales strategies.
	Ensure excellent customer service throughout the sales cycle.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Estate Management, or related field.
	2 - 4 years of proven experience in sales, preferably in real estate.
	Strong communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	Ability to meet and exceed sales targets.
	Good understanding of real estate markets and property trends.
	Proficiency in CRM tools and Microsoft Office applications.
	Self-motivated, result-driven, and confident with client engagement.
	Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 30th December, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info.detconsultingltd@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Junior Accountant

Job Locations: Ogun and Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Junior Accountant to support daily financial operations and ensure accuracy in accounting records.
	The ideal candidate will assist with bookkeeping, financial reporting, reconciliations, and other accounting functions while maintaining compliance with established standards and procedures.


Responsibilities


	Assist in the preparation of financial statements, management reports, and accounting schedules.
	Maintain accurate bookkeeping records including accounts payable and receivable.
	Perform bank reconciliations and verify financial transactions.
	Support month-end and year-end closing activities.
	Process invoices, payments, and expense claims in a timely manner.
	Assist with budget preparation and financial analysis.
	Ensure compliance with accounting policies, internal controls, and regulatory requirements.
	Maintain organized documentation and proper filing of financial records.
	Collaborate with the Accounts team to improve financial processes and accuracy.
	Handle any other duties assigned by the Head of Accounts.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in accounting, Finance, or related field.
	2 – 4 years of accounting experience, preferably in a structured environment.
	Strong understanding of accounting principles and financial reporting.
	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Sage, Zoho Books).
	Good knowledge of Excel and other financial analysis tools.
	Excellent attention to detail and strong numerical accuracy.
	Strong organizational and communication skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
	* High level of integrity and confidentiality.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 15th December, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info.detconsultingltd@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

4.) Sales Technology Personnel

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a smart, innovative, and highly analytical Sales Technology to strengthen our technology-driven sales operations. In this role, you will champion the adoption, optimization, and integration of digital tools that enable the sales team to perform at peak efficiency.
	The ideal candidate is tech-savvy, data-oriented, and passionate about transforming sales processes through intelligent solutions.


Responsibilities


	Drive the implementation, management, and enhancement of CRM systems and sales automation tools.
	Provide data-driven insights by generating, analyzing, and interpreting sales performance reports.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth integration of sales technologies across the organization.
	Develop and execute technology strategies that improve lead management, conversion efficiency, and customer engagement.
	Train, support, and empower the sales team on the effective use of digital tools and platforms.
	Monitor industry trends and emerging technologies, recommending innovative solutions that propel sales performance.
	Ensure the accuracy, integrity, and security of sales data across all platforms.
	Troubleshoot system issues and coordinate solutions with internal IT teams or external vendors.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in information technology, Business Administration, Marketing, or related fields.
	3 – 5 years of hands-on experience in Sales Technology, CRM Management, or Sales Operations.
	Strong proficiency in CRM platforms (Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho, etc.).
	Excellent analytical skills with experience using data tools such as Excel, Power BI, or similar platforms.
	Solid understanding of sales processes, customer lifecycle management, and revenue operations.
	Exceptional communication, presentation, and problem-solving abilities.
	Proven ability to translate technical insights into practical solutions for business growth.
	Experience with automation, integrations, and digital sales enablement tools is a strong advantage.


Salary
N300,000 - N350,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 15th December, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info.detconsultingltd@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail
